    • errorAction

      public void errorAction​(@Nonnull Throwable exception)
      Exceptions for package "java.net." refer to errors in client-server communication and do not refer to the API call made. For example: UnknownHostException It makes no sense to log the stack trace.

      The rest of the errors will be logged with the stack trace.

      Specified by:
      errorAction in interface ResponseInterceptAction
      Parameters:
      exception - - Exception thrown when making a request to the server
